description: Show e^iπ + 1 = 0. Title 'The Most Beautiful Equation' starts CENTER then animates UP. Show constants: e = 2.718 in BLUE, i = √-1 in GREEN, π = 3.14159 in RED. Explain that multiplying by i rotates by 90 degrees. Show e^iπ rotates from 1 to -1 on a number line. Use actual π symbol not pi. Put final equation in ONE Text object centered: 'e^iπ + 1 = 0' all in YELLOW. No separate Text objects for equation parts. Keep labels away from axes.
title: Geometry Dash: Precision Run
